TextView.android:text: Output radiated within each 0.5MHz band centered at ± 0.8MHz from the nominal freq. is not more than 200mw
Output radiated within each 0.5MHz band centered at ± 2MHzfrom the nominal freq. is not more than 2mW
The EIRP content within any 0.5MHz band decrease monotonically as band centre freq. moves away from the nominal channel freq.
Peak Power Output / Peak EIRP such that field intensity >‐89dBW/m² at service volume limits
Sensitivity / Such that power density at antenna > ‐103dBW/m²
Sensitivity variation with load / <1dB for loading between 0 and 90% of max. transmission rate
Bandwidth / Such that sensitivity degrades < 3dB for interrogation freq. drift of ± 100KHz
DECODER / No response to interrogations with pulse spacing more than 2µs from nominal
Monitor action / Monitor alarmwhen : Reply delay varies by more than 1µs (0.5µs for DME associated with landing aid)
1350 pulse pairs during key down periods proper Morse code sequence
RF Cables & Connector \n(Properly connected & No breaks, cracks or corrosion.)
Interconnecting wire harness, coaxial cables & connectors \n (Free from corrosion, breaks, cracks & burns.)
